name: Kobold Kwest
description:
You are a Kobold on a quest. You have been tasked by your magnanimous dragon overlord to find a long-lost treasure within the deepest and darkest caves. Using your trusty slime companion, you must navigate traps and evade monsters as you brave the caverns.

Keep your eye out for secrets, as there are four secret journal pages to find!

--------------------------------------

                   Controls

WASD to move
E to Control Slime
Click to Activate Slime Abilities

Watermelon - Block Slime
Banana - Grapple Slime
Durian - Stink Slime
Pear - Light Slime
